Alabama: Huntsville HA; Tuscaloosa HA; Anniston HA; Phenix City HA; Montgomery HA;
Decatur HA; Mobile HA.
Georgia: Housing Authority of Columbus; Augusta Housing Authority; Macon‑Bibb County
HA; Savannah HA.
Mississippi: Hattiesburg HA; Gulfport HA; Biloxi HA; South Mississippi HA (regional).*
Florida (North/Central): Tallahassee HA; Gainesville HA; Pensacola HA.
South Carolina: Housing Authority of Florence; Greenville HA; Spartanburg HA; Rock Hill
HA.
North Carolina: Asheville HA; Fayetteville Metropolitan HA; Wilmington HA; Greensboro
HA; Winston‑Salem HA; Durham HA.
*Regional entities to be confirmed for scope and authority.
Next step: pull contacts (ED/CFO), unit/voucher counts, and latest score bands; load into
CRM staging, then upsert to production.
Funnel 3 – Traceability & Mapping (Compliance & Broad Utility)
Context
Affordable, field‑first mapping/reporting with exports (GeoJSON, KML, Shapefile, photos)
and a shareable Map Area Report. Useful to co‑ops, exporters, miners, real estate, and
land‑use users.
Gift
Free access for the first 10 mapped parcels per organization (online version now; offline
roadmap staged).
Funnel Stages
1) Gift access page → 2) Self‑serve mapping or guided session → 3) Report delivery
(shareable) → 4) Subscription/pilot upsell → 5) Region packs/API (enterprise).
Propagation Trigger
Every report carries your brand; when shared to a buyer or colleague, it generates inbound
leads.
Collateral
- Gift Landing copy
- Onboarding email
- Sample report links
- Pilot SOW template
Partner Playbooks (One‑Pager per Thread)

- Refuge Churches: who to target, 3‑minute pitch, grant brief attachment, propagation ask.
- PHAs: developer‑fee math, non‑recourse note, sample term sheet, CTA for 30‑minute
review.
- Traceability: mapping gift steps, export list, pilot success metrics, referral loop.
Outreach Cadence & KPIs
Monthly partner nudges (brief win, grant deadline, n
